snippet: A large number of Taliban fighters attacked Khan Neshin District, the fifth of Helmand’s 14 districts in which the government centers have now fallen.
abstract: Taliban fighters capture Khan Neshin District in Helmand Province, Afghanistan, handing group control of important territory and consolidating its grip on province.

byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Rod Nordland reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan. Mujib Mashal contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: A large number of Taliban fighters attacked Khan Neshin District, the fifth of Helmand’s 14 districts in which the government centers have now fallen.

headline.main: A 5th District in Helmand Province Falls to the Taliban
headline.print_headline: Another District in an Afghan Province Falls to the Taliban

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
